body:
School conjuration (teleportation)

Level bard 3, magus 3, sorcerer/wizard 3, summoner 3, witch 3

Duration instantaneous

Saving Throw Will negates (harmless)

Spell Resistance yes (harmless)

Target Restrictions selected

A wordspell with this effect word teleports willing targets to another location within line of sight of the wordcaster and within range of the wordspell.
name: Dimensional Hop
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Words of Power/Effect Words/Teleportation Words/Dimensional Hop
